name: diary of slaughter
description:
what if a survival horror villain owned a journal?

inspired by the keeper's diary from re1.

contains: violence, blood, a single-ish instance of profanity, body horror, bugs, death, cannibalism, and a minimalistic layout.

note: walls aren't passable, but rust stains are.

bitsy was made by adam le doux.

image-to-bitsy was made by tinybird.
